extendedInfo.description: CAUTION: It's dangerous to uninstall/disable stock contacts app, which is required to make emergency calls (911 etc.)! Test calling emergency services firstly, before you start using this app!âSuper easy-to-useâFast and smoothâExtra light-weightâSmart T9 algorithmâ30+ languagesâDirectly call/text to someone by swiping left/rightâVarious themes and pluginsThis is a trial version with 7 days trial period. When the trial period expired, you will be asked to buy PRO version. You can still keep trying if you haven't decided to buy.Help to translate to your language, please visit http://crowdin.net/project/dialerâUseful Skillsâ¢ Long press the contacts button(at left-bottom corner of dialer view) to quick access favoritesâ¢ Dial "#" key to perform phone number searchingâ¢ Dial "*" key to display list of most frequently contacted contactsâ¢ Swipe contact item left or right, to send SMS or make a call directlyâSupported VoIP appsâ¢ System SIP clientâ¢ Skypeâ¢ Viberâ¢ Fringâ¢ MobileVOIPâ¢ GrooVe IPâ¢ Acrobits Softphoneâ¢ Media5-foneâPluginsâ¢ ConnectVibratePerforms vibrate notification when outgoing call connected or call disconnectedâ¢ xMissedCallHelp exDialer to grant ability to clear missed call notificationsâ¢ ShortcutCustomize icons of exDialer by creating shortcutsâ¢ GeocoderProvides the location information of phone numbersâKnown Issuesâ¢ Missed call notifications remained> Try "xMissedCall Patch" or "xMissedCall Plugin" if your phone is rooted.â¢ Unable to select SIM card ID when make a call on phones with Dual SIM cards.> Android SDK does not support Dual SIM cards. So, I have no way to solve this problem until Google release new SDK which supports Dual SIM cards.âLanguagesEnglish, Chinese, Polish, Greek, Chinese Traditional, Portuguese, Spanish, Russian, German, French, Danish, Czech, Hebrew, Slovene, Persian, Bulgarian, Italian, Georgian, Turkish, Romanian, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Indonesian, Norwegian, Arabic, Latvian, Croatian, Slovak, Dutch, Korean, Serbian, Belarusian, EstonianâAcknowledgments:  Excellent MiUI rom  http://www.miui.com  thinkpanda teamTranslations  Translators on Crowdin http://crowdin.net/project/dialer  Piotrek Paszek --- Polish  dancer_69 --- Greek  Kayusumi --- Chinese Traditional  Filipe Garcia --- Portuguese  hopler --- Spanish  ÐÐ»ÑÑ Ð¯ÐºÐ¾Ð²Ð»ÐµÐ² & ÐÐ»ÑÑ Ð¸ ÐÑÑ --- Russian  TweetyPeety --- German  scrpn30 --- French  Neo3000x --- Danish  crking --- Czech  0ftal --- Hebrew  gepardus --- Slovene  Alireza Afkar --- Persian  Ð¡ÑÐ¾ÑÐ½ ÐÐ²Ð°Ð½Ð¾Ð², ÐÐ¸Ð¼Ð¸ÑÑÑ ÐÐ¸Ð¼Ð¸ÑÑÐ¾Ð² --- Bulgarian  stegg, Alex --- Italian  giorgi-alonso --- Georgian  ÃzgÃ¼rce --- Turkish  Turdo D. --- Romanian  Indiant --- Hungarian  alienyd --- Vietnamese  distan7 --- Indonesian  MariusOX --- Norwegian  machhho --- Arabic  janni_mz --- Latvian  Mihovil Stanic --- Croatian  pRo_lama --- Slovak  Planet X --- Dutch  dusttea, Sang Gu Bach --- Korean  Marko Kostic, Zoran MihajloviÄ --- Serbian  Ivan Katlianik --- Belarusian  iff2 --- Estonian  ÐÐ³Ð¾Ñ ÐÐ¼ÐµÐ»ÑÑÑÐº --- Ukrainian  Vladimir Zemlianskij a.k.a sait0n --- Lithuanian  Eduard Babayan(edo248) --- Armenian  All guys in XDA forum who give me great suggestionsKeywords: phone,dialer,dial,contacts,contact,theme,smart dialer,T9,pinyin,miui,quick dial,speed dial

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent app easy smooth and beautiful
reviews.author: John Papadopoulos

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: So much better than stock dialer. It was worth the money. I\'m currently using the ios7 lite theme and it\'s beautiful. Keep up the good work!  Nexus4
reviews.author: Madd Mike

reviews.title: One of The best but
reviews.comment: I wish when we t9ed a contract and hold press, the \"delete contact\"option should be appeared
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Now i dont\342\200\246
reviews.comment: \342\200\246know much about Miui but this dialer is impressive, and the fastest one too. I love the fact i can switch themes too. Not many dialers have impressed me but this is one of those you won\'t stop using for a while
reviews.author: Nathan Greene

reviews.title: Good enough.
reviews.comment: As in good enough to justify downloading a dialer/contacts app when my phoned already has one. Lots of little subtle improvements over stock.
reviews.author: Danny O\'Keefe

reviews.title: Layout colors, backup default contact number
reviews.comment: Please, make option to change COLOR of at least one of two T9 layouts. I use 2 different languages. It helps to focus on the right layout. Also it is beneficial to have possibility to backup default numbers for all contacts before flash new firmware.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: can\'t add photo in contacts
reviews.comment: Ex dialer is very very great...greate look and feel .but there is problem..i am not able to add photo in contacts please help asap............................if this problem solve i will give ***** 5 star thanks
reviews.author: Vinod Chandanshive

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: So much faster than defaoult app and with much more options.
reviews.author: Damir Vranic

reviews.title: So good
reviews.comment: One of the top 5 purchases I\'ve made on the Play Store. It\'s fast, customizable and logical.
reviews.author: Jonas Kamp

reviews.title: Nice and stable
reviews.comment: Good one..works well for me.. Hats off to the one hand operations update...that used to be the only glitch... Now that being solved..there is a new minor issue...on onee hand operation style..the dialer cant be slided to the opposite side easily...the swipe to slide the dialer function isn\'t perfect...needs an update badly...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bugs you to buy the pro version
reviews.comment: I would rate this higher of not for annoying message to tell you to buy the pro version. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Gerard Vincent

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: The most smooth T9 dialer app on the market. Two suggestions.  1. Even ticked \"keep in memory \" the app still seems to reload when I open it after a while of inactivity.  2. Add option to add a button for \"close keypad\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Smooth & comfortable
reviews.comment: Easy to use
reviews.author: yshika de silva

reviews.title: Realy nice
reviews.comment: It\'s fast and sample design. Exigent
reviews.author: Dragan Zlatkovski

reviews.title: Very good!!!
reviews.comment: Just awesome!!!!!
reviews.author: Jennifer Ramos

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Works well easy to use and customize
reviews.author: Ronnie Mckenney

reviews.title: Finally the UI I\'ve been looking for
reviews.comment: This is like a breath of fresh air, thank you!
reviews.author: Yuri Leikind

reviews.title: Update flaw
reviews.comment: I recently updated my exDialer and the dial pad touch tones are annoyingly short now (non-responsive to touch length) Why change what was perfect? Will change stars as soon as you fix this! Thanks.
reviews.author: Julian Kaztman

reviews.title: Incr\303\255vel!
reviews.comment: Comprei um Nexus 4 e senti a falta de poder s\303\263 iniciar digitar o n\303\272mero do telefone e ele j\303\241 puxar o resto atrav\303\251s dos meus contatos. Tinha isso no Galaxy S3. Isso era o que faltava para deixar o Nexus 4 100%! Recomendo! 7,50 mais bem gastos na Play Store!
reviews.author: Diogo Lubrani Amato

reviews.title: Scam
reviews.comment: If there no actual features that comes with paying for a pro version than make it completely free. Every pro version of an app I\'ve ever owned had a reason to pay for it you know added features not paying to take away a notification that shouldn\'t be there to began with. I can understand paying to get rid of ads but you\'re intentionally placing a notification and charging a 4.00 fee to get rid of it is completely out of line and uncalled for.
reviews.author: Eugene Bigham
